subject: [sugar] Change of address for OLPC mailing lists
body:
I finally moved us to a new mail server setup a few hours ago. As a sideeffect, mailing lists are now hosted at @lists.laptop.org, so anyexisting filters you have set up will likely need to be updated. Thoughlegacy addresses (e.g. sugar@laptop.org) will keep working for theforeseeable future, please send new list mail to the full list address(sugar@lists.laptop.org) instead.
Cheers,
-- Ivan Krsti\u0107 
_______________________________________________Sugar mailing listSugar@lists.laptop.orghttp://lists.laptop.org/listinfo/sugar
